meanings.definition: The outermost connective tissue covering an organ or structure.
meanings.sent1: The adventitia of the heart provides support and protection.
meanings.sent2: Doctors carefully examined the adventitia of the liver during the surgery.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous adventitia of the kidney decided to take a break and relax.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness acted as the adventitia, wrapping around everyone with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The adventitia, like a shield, shielded the delicate organ from harm.

meanings.definition: A layer of tissue surrounding a blood vessel.
meanings.sent1: The adventitia of the artery helps maintain its shape and structure.
meanings.sent2: The surgeon focused on repairing the damaged adventitia of the vein.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous adventitia of the blood vessel played hide and seek with the cells.
meanings.sent4: His determination was like the adventitia, holding everything together in times of trouble.
meanings.sent5: The adventitia, a guardian, protected the blood vessel from external forces.
